summary:
I am a Belgian-Indonesian recent International Law Cum Laude graduate from Leiden University living in the Netherlands. I currently work for Omnia Retail as part of their Junior Consultant Traineeship program. Prior to living in the Netherlands I lived in Indonesia, Singapore and Australia having also completed internships in the United Kingdom and United States.

My 2 internships were at L'Oreal Luxury as part of their marketing department and at Phillips Collection as a logistics intern in the UK and US respectively. My internship at L'Oreal in the summer of 2019 had me manage and support marketing initiatives at in person L'Oreal sales points. This had me working with domestic retailers serving as an intermediary between them and different branches at L'Oreal. On the other hand my internship at Phillips Collection in the summer of 2022 involved me creating new procedure to improve supply chains by working with suppliers in South and South-East Asia as well as create new warehouse procedures. These new procedures aimed to improve sustainability, profitability and safety of the wider Phillips Collection supply chain.

In the Summer of 2022 I graduated from Leiden University College, the honours program of Leiden University. During my studies I majored in International Law, graduating Cum Laude and as class representative for the graduating class of 2022.  I focused my studies on socio-legal studies writing my thesis on the legislative developments of the Indonesian education system. On top of academics I was heavily involved in faculty decision making as an elected student member of the Universities Advisory Council as well as College Council in 2022. 

Whilst at University I was regularly engaged in student life chairing and working on multiple student committees such as but not limited to the sports committee, travel and debate as well as theatre events for over 600 people. In conjunction with that I was also elected as board member of Fortuna, the faculty study association between August 2020 and July 2021.

Beyond that I was also fortunate enough to start up Vision-Swipe, a student committee where we had the chance to interview and write articles with notable individuals including the then EU Special Envoy to Afghanistan focusing on active negotiations with the Taliban and the Belgian Ambassador to Japan on women in the diplomatic field.

education.field_of_study: Honours Student of International Justice at Leiden University College The Hague
education.grade: 3.6 GPA | Cum Laude Graduate | Class Representative for the Class of 2022

profile_positions.description: Omnia Retail is the company behind Europe's first dynamic pricing software. Built by two industry experts — one a retail software engineer, the other a retail strategy consultant — Omnia was created to help each founder’s respective clients achieve more with their pricing. Omnia’s mission is to help retailers and brands take control of their pricing and grow profitably with automation and insights, and the enterprise-ready software makes it easy for teams to manage pricing without the need for IT.
profile_positions.title: Junior Consultant

profile_positions.description: I worked as an Intern for Phillips Collection helping with stock management and logistics in their North Carolina warehouses by implementing an RFID tracking system for goods stored in the warehouses in order to have a better overview of stock movement and fluctuation. As part of this role I looked into shipping, supply chains and inventory management in order to explore ways to make the system more efficient, sustainable and profitable. This process involved observation of practice coupled with working closely with suppliers and manufacturers in South and South-East Asia in order to draft policy and procedural recommendations.
profile_positions.title: Logistics Intern

profile_positions.description:
VisionSwipe Talks, created in the framework of Leiden University College, brings a variety of visions to the table through the discussion of events hitting our headlines today. Our aim is to inspire by sharing visions through talks led by guest speakers with prestigious reputations in their fields to discuss their outlook on events that are shaping our world. Going beyond passive learning, VisionSwipe also presents students with the opportunity to further their interest and co-write an article with the expert.

Examples of recent guests and topics include EU Special Envoy to Afghanistan on the humanitarian situation in Afghanistan and how European countries can help as well as the Belgian Ambassador to Japan on the growing role of women in International Diplomacy
profile_positions.title: Creator and Co-Chair

profile_positions.description: Committee Affairs Officer responsible for coordinating and organising events and extra curricular activities with over 30 different committees and teams within the faculty for events ranging from large scale gala's to smaller more frequent events. Also responsible for coordinating with other university student associations to organise various activities through out the year such as sports tournaments and cultural events
profile_positions.title: Committee Affairs Officer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for assisting the Retail Design team for L'Oréal Luxury based out of the London office working both at retail locations and the main office. This included product analytics and customer service to ascertain customer spending and purchasing patterns.
profile_positions.title: Summer Staff
